changeSet.author: Pritam
changeSet.comment: Adding Concepts for Anesthesie Notes Post Opératoir

changeSet.author: Pritam

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) From concept_reference_term where `code` in ( "149086", "108", "120148", "116214", "158592", "150787", "148888", "140238", "144464", "512", "123468") and retired = 0 and concept_source_id = ( select concept_source_id from concept_reference_source where `name` = 'CEIL' and retired =0 );

changeSet.author: Pritam

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('None', 'GAI', 'GAO', 'GAL', 'RSA', 'RPX', 'RTA', 'RAO', 'LOA', 'SED', 'INF') and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Type d\'anesthésie réalisée");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Outcome of Type d'anesthésie réalisée

changeSet.author: Pritam

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ( "Aucun", "Reaction allergique", "Bronchospasm", "Dysrythmie cardiaque", "Lésion dentaire", "Hypotension", "Hypothermie", "Lésions positionnelles", "Aspiration pulmonaire", "Saignement non anticipé", "Autre" ) and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Complication de l\'anesthésie");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Outcome of Antécédents médicaux

changeSet.author: Pritam

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Oui","Non") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Transfuson sanguine");

changeSet.author: Pritam

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Sang Total","CG","PFC","Plaquettes","Albumine","Autre") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Produit sanguin administré en per opératoire");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Produit sanguin administré en per opératoire

changeSet.author: Pritam

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('Aucune', 'ABO incompatibility', 'Anaphylaxis', 'Fever', 'Hemolysis', 'Hypotension', 'Rash', 'Urticaria', 'Autre') and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Réaction transfusionnelle per operatoire");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Réaction transfusionnelle per operatoire

changeSet.author: Pritam

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('Aucun', 'Catheter Foley', 'Voie veineuse Peripherique', 'PICC Line', 'VVC', 'Sonde nasogastrique', 'Autre') and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Matériel présent");
